XXvtrksopu:401: pratiṣedhyasya hi śītasparśasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:402: 14) kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā na romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavān ayaṃ pradeśo dhūmād iti /
XXvtrksopu:403: pratiṣedhyānāṃ romaharṣādiviśeṣānāṃ kāraṇaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:407: pratiṣedhyasya tuṣārasparśasya vyāpakaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:408: 16) kāryaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṇāni santi dhūmād iti /
XXvtrksopu:409: pratiṣedhyānāṃ śītakāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ //
XXvtrksopu:413: tathā svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādāv apy anupalabdhirūpatā vidyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:414: sahābhāvākṣepikā yasyopalabdhiḥ sā tasyānupalabdhir ity anupalabdhilakṣaṇayogāt /
XXvtrksopu:415: tathā hi yeyaṃ vahner upalabdhiḥ sā śītābhāvam ākṣipati /
XXvtrksopu:416: 11. bhavatv anupalabdhiḥ sā dṛśyatā tu katham /
XXvtrksopu:419: tathā hi yadi śītasparśo dṛśyo bhavet tadā tasyopalabdhiṃ niṣedhyābhāvavyāpto vahnir viruṇaddhy eva /
XXvtrksopu:420: evam abhāvasādhanī sarvaivānupalabdhir vyāptisāmarthyād [Ts_293] dṛśyasyopalabdhiṃ viruṇaddhīti sāmarthyāt svabhāvānupalabdhir bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:422: yasyāṃ tv anupalabdhau tadaiva tam eva pratipattāraṃ prati dṛśyatvaṃ pratiṣedhyasya siddhaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhir eva tasyāḥ svalakṣaṇam iti sākṣāt svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:424: yady api saṃpratitanī dṛśyānupalabdhir nāsti virodhādikāle tv āsīd saiva bhāvapratipattinibandhanam iti /
XXvtrksopu:426: saṃpratitanyaś ca dṛśyānupalabdher abhāvāt tatsvabhāvānupalabdher anyāsām anupalabdhīnāṃ bheda iti /
XXvtrksopu:427: 12. yad api kaiścit svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādīnām anumitānumānatayā dṛśyānupalabdhirūpatocyate /
XXvtrksopu:428: dūrād vahne rūpaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā uṣṇasparśaviśeṣas taddeśavyāpako 'numīyate tasmāc ca śītasparśābhāvapratītiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:429: āhatya tu dṛśyānupalabdher anudayād dṛśyānupalabdher bhedena nirdeśaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:430: ata eva cānumitānumānam etat kevalam atyantābhyāsāj jhaṭiti tathābhūtapratītyudaye saty ekam anumānam ucyate /
XXvtrksopu:431: vastutas tv anekam anumānam etat evam anyatrāpi vyāpakaviruddhopalambhādāv ūhyam iti dvayam apy etan na manasi toṣam ādadhāti //
XXvtrksopu:433: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno na hetusattāvyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid dhetum apekṣate /
XXvtrksopu:435: anena ca viśeṣaṇe nāntyāt kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yad utpadyate tasya saṃgrahaḥ [Ts_294] kṛtaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:436: tad api hi tasya svabhāva eva /
XXvtrksopu:438: anyārtham api kṛtam anyārthaṃ bhavatīti nyāyāt paravipratipattir api nirākṛtā /
XXvtrksopu:439: pare hi paścātkālabhāvinam api kṛtakatvādidharmaṃ svabhāvam icchantīti /
XXvtrksopu:441: kāryaṃ yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi kāraṇe hetur iti prakṛtam /
XXvtrksopu:442: kāraṇe sādhye yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi tair eva hetuḥ /
XXvtrksopu:446: sādhyaś ca vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā anyonyalakṣaṇavyavacchedalakṣaṇatvād anayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:449: arthāntare tu gamye kāryam iti dvāv etau vidhisādhanau /
XXvtrksopu:452: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet /
XXvtrksopu:454: nanu svabhāvapratibandham antareṇāpi candrodayāt kumudavikāsapratipattiḥ samudravṛddhiś ca /
XXvtrksopu:457: tat katham ucyate svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:461: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥsa tarn apratibaddhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na na vyabhicaratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:463: tathā hi hetudharmasyaiva tādṛśo 'trānumitir yatrāmbhojabodhādaya ekakālā jātāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:465: vāyuviśeṣa eva ca yaḥ kṛttikādyudayakāraṇaṃsa eva hi saṃtatyā rohiṇyādyudayakāraṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:478: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:483: viruddhopalabdhyādau tu tattadviviktapradeśādikāryatvāt tādṛśasya [Ts_296] dahanādes tadutpattinibandhana eva iti // //
XXvtrksopu:486: pūrvam uktaṃ yat trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya yat prakāśakaṃ vacanaṃ tat parārtham anumānaṃ kāraṇe kāryopacārāt /
XXvtrksopu:495: visadṛśo dharmo yasya sa vidharmā tasya bhāvo vaidharmyam /
XXvtrksopu:498: yasya ca vaidharmyam abhidheyaṃ tad vaidharmyavat /
XXvtrksopu:499: nanu ca sādharmyavati sādhanavākye vyatireko nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:500: vaidharmyavati cānvayas tat kathaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:504: sādharmyābhidheyena yukte prayoge samarthyād vyatirekasya pratītis tasmāt trirūpaliṅgākhyānam /
XXvtrksopu:505: tasmin vyatireke buddhyāvasīyamāne 'sati sādhyena hetor anvayasya buddhyāvasitasyābhāvāt //
XXvtrksopu:509: tatheti yathānvayavākye tathārthād eva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyānabhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:510: asati tasminn anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddher anavasāyāt /
XXvtrksopu:511: tasmād ekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayor liṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bḥavatīti nāvaśyaṃ vākyadvayaprayogaḥ //
XXvtrksopu:512: 4. tatrānupalabdheḥ sādharmyavān prayogaḥ yad yatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san nopalabhyate sa tatrāsadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:514: nopalabhyate ca kvacitpradeśaviśeṣa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti /
XXvtrksopu:515: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ śaśaśirasaḥ sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptapratiṣedhyānupalambhahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:517: yat sat tat sarvam anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ saṃś ca śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:524: sā ca bhāvasyātmabhūtaiva kevalaṃ kalpanayā vyatirekiṇīva pradarśyate /
XXvtrksopu:525: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:526: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtaka iti /
XXvtrksopu:528: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmibhiḥ sādhyadharmiṇāṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:529: sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ [Ts_298] pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandha eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:534: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatra vahnir yathā mahānase /
XXvtrksopu:536: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo mahānasasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasya dhūmahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:537: ihāpi tribhir anupalambhair dvābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhave kāraṇe sādhye kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:542: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo nilaviśeṣasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaniṣedhyānupalambhākhyahetukṛtaṃ vaisādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:543: 7. svabhāvahetor vaidharmyavantaḥ prayogāḥ asaty anityatve nāsti kvacit sattvaṃ yathā gaganamaline /
XXvtrksopu:545: asaty anityatve na kvacid utpattimattvaṃ yathākāśe /
XXvtrksopu:547: asaty anityatve na kvacit kṛtakatvaṃ yathā kurmaromni /
XXvtrksopu:549: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:551: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā mahāhrade /
XXvtrksopu:553: [Ts_299] atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:554: 9. trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānam ity arthān na pakṣādivacanam anumānam uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:555: tatra pratijñā tāvan na sākṣāt sādhanam /
XXvtrksopu:557: artha eva hy arthaṃ gamayati pratibandhān /
XXvtrksopu:561: sādhyasādhanadharmaviśeṣopadarśanārtham anavayavabhūtāpi pratijñā dṛṣṭāntavat prayujyata iti cet /
XXvtrksopu:563: evaṃ hy anujñādivākyam api prayoktavyaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:564: na hi tair vinā eva sādhanasya pravṛttir saṃbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:567: tathā hi yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ kṛtakaś ca śabda ity etāvanmātre prayukte 'nityaḥ śabda iti pratītir bhavaty evāntareṇa pratijñāvacanam /
XXvtrksopu:571: asati hi pratijñānirdeśe pakṣāpekṣānibandhanaṃ trairūpyaṃ nāstīti /
XXvtrksopu:573: tathā hi pratijñāvacanam antareṇāpi sarvaṃ saṃpadyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:574: upanayanasya punar arthaḥ pakṣadharmavacanenaiva nirdiṣṭa iti na tatpūrvake tasya kaścid upayogaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:575: vyāptipūrvake vacane pakṣadharmavacanād eva tadarthasiddheḥ kim anenopanayena /
XXvtrksopu:585: asiddhau saṃdehe vā pratipādyasya pratipādakasya hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:586: 11. tatraikasya rūpasya dharmisaṃbandhasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:588: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādyasiddham /
XXvtrksopu:590: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhya utpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃvādino 'siddham /
XXvtrksopu:591: atra cotpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetur na yugapat tathā hi parārtho hetūpanyāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:592: parasya cāsata utpāda utpattimattvaṃ sataś ca niranvayo vināśo 'nityatvaṃ siddham iti /
XXvtrksopu:594: yathā bāspādibhāvena saṃdigdho bhūtasaṃghāto 'gnisiddhau bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaḥ samūho 'gnisiddhyartham upādīyamāno 'siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:595: yathā ceha nikūñjemayūraḥ kekāyitād iti tadāpātadeśavibhrame /
XXvtrksopu:596: āpātanam āpātas tasya kekāyitasyāpāta utpādas tasya deśas tasya vibhramo bhrāntiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:597: atha vā āpataty āgacchaty asmād ity āpātaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:600: yat punar ucyate 'nyair āpāta āgamanam iti tad ayuktam /
XXvtrksopu:608: tasmād yady ayam ātmā sarvagato na bhavet /
XXvtrksopu:609: kathaṃ dakṣiṇāpatha upalabdhāḥ sukhādayo madhyadeśa upalabhyante /
XXvtrksopu:610: ākāśavad iti dṛṣṭānte ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:611: sa ca yathā vikāriṇi puruṣa upalabhyate tathānyatrāpīti /
XXvtrksopu:612: syād eṣa hetur yadi bauddhasya sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvam ātmanaḥ siddhaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:616: yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe ca vartamānaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:621: nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād ity atra nityatve sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayor vartate /
XXvtrksopu:622: ekadeśe ca vartamāna ity atrāpi sapakṣavipakṣayor iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:624: na kevalaṃ sapakṣavipakṣavyāpi [Ts_302] prameyatvam anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:627: yo vā sapakṣavipakṣayor ekadeśavṛttiḥ sarvo 'sāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsa iti /
XXvtrksopu:628: tatra prayatnānantariyakaḥ śabdo 'nityatvād ghaṭavad ity ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:629: vidyuti vartamānatvād ākāśādāv avartamānatvāt sapakṣavyāpī tu bhavaty eva /
XXvtrksopu:638: asparśatvaṃ hi vipakṣaikadeśe buddhyādau sapakṣaikadeśe cākāśādau vartata ity ubhayapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:641: yathā sarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:642: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:647: sapakṣe sattvasyāsapakṣe cāsattvasya yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddhahetvābhāsaḥ //
XXvtrksopu:649: anayoḥ [Ts_303] sapakṣe 'sattvam asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:651: dvayo rūpayor ekasyāsiddhāv aparasya ca saṃdehe 'naikāntikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:656: yathā vītarāgaḥ sarvajño vā vaktṛtvād iti /
XXvtrksopu:658: sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād vacanādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā saṃdigdham /
XXvtrksopu:661: na hi sātmakānatmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra praṇādir vartate /
XXvtrksopu:665: 15. evam eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:670: tathā dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam iti yathāsaṃbhavam /
XXvtrksopu:672: tathā sapakṣe sattvasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cānaikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:673: evam ekaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa [Ts_304] uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:674: tathā dvayor dvayo rūpayor viparyayasiddhau viruddho hetvābhāsa uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:675: asapakṣe sattvasya ca saṃdehe vā 'naikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:676: tathā sapakṣāsapakṣayor api hetoḥ sadasattvasaṃdehe 'naikāntika eva /
XXvtrksopu:677: evaṃ dvayor dvayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca viruddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa iti /
XXvtrksopu:678: 16. nanu katham uktaṃ trayo hetvābhāsā iti /
XXvtrksopu:679: yāvatā vaiphalyam api hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇam asti / tad uktam /
XXvtrksopu:680: sādhanaṃ yad vivādena nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate /
XXvtrksopu:681: kiṃ sādhyam anyathāniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā // iti
XXvtrksopu:682: atra kecid āhuḥ satyam asty eva vaiphalyaṃ hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:683: yat punar asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikakathanaṃ viniścayādau tad asāmarthyaprabhedena /
XXvtrksopu:688: syād etad yadi vaiyarthyaṃ nāma hetor dūṣaṇaṃ syāt kiṃ tu pramāṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:690: adhigatam api gamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syād iti /
XXvtrksopu:693: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim itīṣyata iti
XXvtrksopu:694: tataś ca katham idaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇam /
XXvtrksopu:695: [Ts_305] athaivam ucyate pramāṇājanakatvād dhetur api vyartha ucyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:696: evaṃ hi vāstavam idaṃ hetor na dūṣaṇaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:699: yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣanaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:703: tathā vaiyarthyapratipakṣeṇāpy anyad rūpam uktaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:705: yadi tarhīdaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ na pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ tarhy anena vādī nigṛhyate //
XXvtrksopu:712: nedaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ tu parārthānumāne vaktur api guṇadoṣāś cintyante iti viphalābhidhāyī apratibhayaiva nigṛhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:713: tathā hi prakṛtam eva sādhyaṃ nāprakṛtam iti sādhyatāyāḥ prakṛter niyāmaka eṣa panthā /
XXvtrksopu:715: doṣāḥ punar nyūnatvam asiddhir vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭasyārthasya viparyayasādhanam aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ceti /
XXvtrksopu:716: atra ca yac codyaṃ parihāraśca tad granthavistarabhayān na likhitam iti /
XXvtrksopu:717: sthitam etad [Ts_306] yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ tadāsiddha evāntarbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:719: 18. triIakṣaṇo hetur uktas tāvatārthapratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścit /
XXvtrksopu:720: tena nāsya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gatārthatvāt /
XXvtrksopu:721: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena i punar aviśeṣeṇa kāryasvabhāvayor janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāv uktau /
XXvtrksopu:723: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam iti sādhyenānugatam idam ekaṃ rūpam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttir iti sādhyanivṛttyā nivṛttir asya dvitīyaṃ rūpam uktam /
XXvtrksopu:727: tac ca darśayatā dhūmas tatrāgnir iti asaty agnau na kvacid dhumo yathā mahānasetarayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:728: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatrānityatvam anityatvābhāve kṛtakatvāsaṃbhavo yathā ghaṭākāśayor iti darśanīyam /
XXvtrksopu:729: na hy anyathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayituṃ /
XXvtrksopu:731: tasyāgnyādeḥ kāryaṃ tatkāryaṃ tasya bhāvas tatkāryatā /
XXvtrksopu:732: na hy anyathā śakyo darśayitum iti liṅgavacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam //
XXvtrksopu:733: 19. asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:736: etenaiveti hetulakṣaṇābhidhānenaiva dṛṣṭāntasyāpi sāmarthyād gatārthatvena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā [Ts_307] api sādhanatvena pratyākhyātā bhavanti /
XXvtrksopu:737: yena hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yathoktaṃ pradarśyate sa saṃyagdṛṣṭāntaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:738: yena punas tasya lakṣaṇadvayaṃ na pradarśyate so dṛṣṭāntābhāsa ity uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:742: atra hi karmaṇi nityatvaṃ sādhyadharmo nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:755: rathyāpuruṣe vacanaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva niścitam iti sādhanadharmas tatra siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:759: rathyāpuruṣe maraṇadharmatvaṃ sādhyadharma utpattimattvādinā liṅgena niścitaṃ rāgādimattvaṃ tv aniścitam iti saṃdigdhasādhanadharmā /
XXvtrksopu:763: yatra sādhyena hetor vyāptir nāsti so 'nanvayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:766: na hi rāgādīnāṃ vacanasya tādātmyalakṣaṇas tadutpattilakṣano vā pratibandho 'sti yenātrānvayaḥ [Ts_308] syāt /
XXvtrksopu:770: na tu vacanenākhyāta ity avidyamāna ivāsau /
XXvtrksopu:774: atra hi yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity anvaye vaktavye yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti viparītam anvayaṃ karoti sarva ete dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ sādharmyeṇa //
XXvtrksopu:794: saṃdigdhasādhanvyatirekaḥ yathā na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvāt /
XXvtrksopu:796: ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantas tad yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāraḥ /
XXvtrksopu:808: yatra vītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
XXvtrksopu:810: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:812: yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśavad iti vaidharmyeṇa /
XXvtrksopu:813: yo hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge vaidharmyeṇākāśavad iti brūyāt tena vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko na pradarśitaḥ tathā /
XXvtrksopu:814: yadāśeṣapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānityatvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvo yathākāśavad iti karoti tadā vyatireko darśito bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:818: atra hi yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakam iti vaktavye /
XXvtrksopu:819: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityam iti vadati //
XXvtrksopu:820: 21. na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
XXvtrksopu:821: ebhiḥ sādhyavikalair dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veti saṃbandhanīyaṃ tadarthāpattyaiṣāṃ nirāso veditavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:822: yasmād ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair dvividham api lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
XXvtrksopu:828: dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ca gṛhyante ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt /
XXvtrksopu:829: anena ca yad ahrīkeṇoktaṃ viparyayasādhanam eva dūṣaṇaṃ nānyad iti tad api parāstaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:833: niścayābhāvo vā bhavati niścayaviparyaya ity asty eva viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:839: yat tarkasopānam idaṃ vidhāya puṇyaṃ mayāptaṃ śaradinduśubhram /
XXvtrksopu:840: tenottamāṃ bodhim ahaṃ labheya lokaś ca niryātu bhavād aśeṣaḥ //
